ShadowSiren:Ambush.NAME: Ambush
ShadowSiren:Ambush.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain [E] and !M! Vigor.
ShadowSiren:Ambush.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain [E] [E] and !M! Vigor.

ShadowSiren:AutoArmor.NAME: Auto-Armor
ShadowSiren:AutoArmor.DESCRIPTION: *Uses !ShadowSiren:UsesCount! NL Whenever you would lose HP, lose !M! less.

ShadowSiren:BlackMagic.NAME: Black Magic
ShadowSiren:BlackMagic.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff, increase its amount by !M!.

ShadowSiren:BlackRose.NAME: Black Roses
ShadowSiren:BlackRose.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! *Shadow *Split to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

ShadowSiren:ChainShock.NAME: Chain Shock
ShadowSiren:ChainShock.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [ElectricIcon] damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

ShadowSiren:Discharge.NAME: Discharge
ShadowSiren:Discharge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [ElectricIcon] damage. NL shadowsiren:Charge affects this card !M! times.

ShadowSiren:EnergizingFlush.NAME: Energized Flush
ShadowSiren:EnergizingFlush.DESCRIPTION: Lose all active shadowsiren:Elements. NL Gain [E] for each shadowsiren:Element lost.
ShadowSiren:EnergizingFlush.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Lose all active shadowsiren:Elements. NL Gain [E] for each shadowsiren:Element lost.

ShadowSiren:FireOrb.NAME: Fire Orb
ShadowSiren:FireOrb.DESCRIPTION: *Uses !ShadowSiren:UsesCount! NL *Attack shadowsiren:Follow-Up: NL Deal !D! [FireIcon] damage. NL *Skill shadowsiren:Follow-Up: NL Gain !M! Vigor.

ShadowSiren:HammerBag.NAME: Hammer Bag
ShadowSiren:HammerBag.DESCRIPTION: *Uses !ShadowSiren:UsesCount! NL *Skill shadowsiren:Follow-Up: NL Add a *Hammer to your hand.

ShadowSiren:HammerToss.NAME: Hammer Toss
ShadowSiren:HammerToss.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Add !M! *Hammer to your hand.

ShadowSiren:IceOrb.NAME: Ice Orb
ShadowSiren:IceOrb.DESCRIPTION: *Uses !ShadowSiren:UsesCount! NL *Attack shadowsiren:Follow-Up: NL Deal !D! [IceIcon] damage. NL *Skill shadowsiren:Follow-Up: NL Gain !B! Block.

ShadowSiren:Infatuate.NAME: Infatuate
ShadowSiren:Infatuate.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and Weak to ALL enemies.

ShadowSiren:MagicCloak.NAME: Magic Cloak
ShadowSiren:MagicCloak.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gains !M! times more Block if you have a debuff.

ShadowSiren:PocketDimension.NAME: Pocket Dimension
ShadowSiren:PocketDimension.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you change active shadowsiren:Elements, draw !M! card.
ShadowSiren:PocketDimension.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you change active shadowsiren:Elements, draw !M! cards.

ShadowSiren:Recuperate.NAME: Recuperate
ShadowSiren:Recuperate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Remove !M! debuff if you have any, otherwise draw !M! card.
ShadowSiren:Recuperate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Remove up to !M! debuffs if you have any, otherwise draw up to !M! cards.

ShadowSiren:Reversal.NAME: Reversal
ShadowSiren:Reversal.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage plus half the targets intent. NL (Deals !ShadowSiren:SecondMagic! damage)

ShadowSiren:ShadowOrb.NAME: Shadow Orb
ShadowSiren:ShadowOrb.DESCRIPTION: *Uses !ShadowSiren:UsesCount! NL *Card shadowsiren:Follow-Up: NL Deal !D! [DarkIcon] damage to ALL enemies.

ShadowSiren:ShadowSneak.NAME: Shadow Sneak
ShadowSiren:ShadowSneak.DESCRIPTION: Autoplay. NL Deal !D! [DarkIcon] damage to a random enemy. NL shadowsiren:Intensify damage by !M!.

ShadowSiren:ShieldConversion.NAME: Shield Conversion
ShadowSiren:ShieldConversion.DESCRIPTION: Lose all active shadowsiren:Elements. NL Gain !B! Block for each shadowsiren:Element lost.

ShadowSiren:Singe.NAME: Singe
ShadowSiren:Singe.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! HP and twice that much Max HP.

ShadowSiren:Thunderstruck.NAME: Thunderstruck
ShadowSiren:Thunderstruck.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [ElectricIcon] damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

ShadowSiren:VigorousShift.NAME: Vigorous Shift
ShadowSiren:VigorousShift.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you change active shadowsiren:Elements, gain !M! Vigor.

ShadowSiren:WhiteOut.NAME: White Out
ShadowSiren:WhiteOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [IceIcon] [DarkIcon] damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
